import '../components/SlideShow.scss' import React from 'react'; import { Slide } from 'react-slideshow-image'; const slideImages = [ 'images/slide_2.jpg', 'images/slide_3.jpg', 'images/slide_4.jpg' ]; const properties = { duration: 5000, transitionDuration: 500, infinite: true, indicators: true, arrows: true } const SlideShow = () => { return (
Slide 1
Slide 2
Slide 3
) } export {SlideShow}
